Package Tiles

Class TileManager

java.lang.Object
Tiles.TileManager
public class TileManager extends Object
This class represents the Tile Manager. It handles everything Tile related (intersections, creation, etc...)
Version:
5/20
Author:
Jerry

    • tileInteract

      public int tileInteract​(int tileNum, Player p, boolean sound)
      Handles the interaction of the player, and tiles within the interaction. This includes sound, damage, and other power up affects
      Parameters:
      tileNum - The tile being tested
      p - The player
      sound - If sound should be played when interacting the tile
      Returns:
      returns the reloadCounter
